title: Is there combustible cladding on high rise flats in Sheffield?

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
1.How many of the high rise flats in Sheffield have been cladded with combustible material similar to that which caused the Grenfell Tower fire in London.  If they have this cladding, which buildings are they and will you be taking immediate remedial action to prevent the risk of fire?
2. How many of our high rises have sprinklers fitted?  If they don't have them, will you be installing sprinkler systems?
Many thanks
Lesley Boulton

Re – Freedom of Information Request – Reference – FOI / 427
Dear Lesley Boulton,
Thank you for your recent request for information relating to Questions
re: combustible cladding in high rise flats which we received on
22/06/2017.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request, and will be

your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act states that we must respond to you within
20 working days, therefore, you should expect to hear a response from us
by 20/07/2017.
In the meantime, if you have any queries please contact us on the number
below.
Thank you.

Dear Lesley Boulton
Re: Freedom of Information Request – Reference FOI427
Thank you for your recent request for information regarding Questions re:
combustible cladding in high rise flats, which we received on 22^nd June
2017.
Please find below, Sheffield City Council’s response to your request:
1.How many of the high rise flats in Sheffield have been cladded with
combustible material similar to that which caused the Grenfell Tower fire
in London.  If they have this cladding, which buildings are they and will
you be taking immediate remedial action to prevent the risk of fire?
One tower block has similar cladding to Grenfell Tower, although not the
same.  The Hanover tower block has been clad with a material called
Alucobond which contains a Polyethylene core.  Work has begun to remove
the cladding from the building.
[1]
http://www.sheffieldnewsroom.co.uk/tower...
2. How many of our high rises have sprinklers fitted?  If they don't have
them, will you be installing sprinkler systems?
Currently only one of our residential tower blocks, Handbank at Callow
Mount, Gleadless, has a sprinkler system.  However the decision has been
taken recently that we will be fitting sprinkler systems in all of our
residential tower blocks.  You can find further information about this at
the following link:
[2]
http://www.sheffieldnewsroom.co.uk/tower...
I hope the information we have provided is of help to your enquiries.  If
you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed.  You can ask for an
internal review by either writing to the above address or by emailing
[3][Sheffield City Council request email].
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioners Office. The Information
Commissioner can be contacted at: The Information Commissioner's Office,

1113, or for further details see their website [4]www.ico.org.uk
